pkgmetadata.longdescription: An Easy Way to Report ROC Analysis // Provides an easy way to report the results of ROC analysis, including: 1. an ROC curve. 2. the value of Cutoff, SEN (sensitivity), SPE (specificity), AUC (Area Under Curve), AUC.SE (the standard error of AUC), PLR (positive likelihood ratio), NLR (negative likelihood ratio), PPV (positive predictive value), NPV (negative predictive value).
